pr_title: Ignore CVEs from htrace and ambari transitive deps

timeline.message:
Ignore CVEs from htrace and ambari transitive deps

htrace CVEs are suppressed for now as addressing them requires updating
the hadoop version.

ambari CVEs are suppressed for now since ambari is updated to the latest
version and is no longer actively maintained.

timeline.bodyText: Can you create a github issue for this so we don't forget.
timeline.author: suneet-s
timeline.diffHunk:
@@ -156,6 +156,28 @@
       <cve>CVE-2018-1320</cve>
       <cve>CVE-2019-0205</cve>
   </suppress>
+  <suppress>
+    <!-- TODO: Fix by using com.datastax.oss:java-driver-core instead of com.netflix.astyanax:astyanax in extensions-contrib/cassandra-stroage -->

timeline.message: Fix compilation issue from ambari upgrade
